story_99_00401/2401_1001_0100_10:
Ni hao, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! How are
you doing?
story_99_00401/2401_1001_0200_10:
I’ve recently begun studying how sync pairs bond
under certain circumstances...
story_99_00401/2401_1001_0300_10:
Namely, when the Trainer raises the Pokémon from
an Egg!
story_99_00401/2401_1001_0400_10:
Would you be a dear and lend me a hand with my
research?
story_99_00401/2401_1001_0500_10:
Here, I have three Pokémon Eggs for you to
choose from! Pick one, and then you can take
care of it until it’s ready to hatch!
